channel.title: Example Title on
channel.description: Recent content in Example Title on

item.description: Elek-Nor was a dark sorcerer of evil intent and mischievous demeanor, who decided to inflict his eponymous book on the realms with a canny spell.

The gilded arrows are enchanted to slay a particular creature, their name engraved upon the length of the glistening shaft. Each archer in a company carries one such arrow, and only they know its intended target.
Experience Points
Attributes are special features which convey a unique bonus. Listed alphabetically.
Character Creation You are a devoted follower of a [[DnDominions/Dominions Players/Creating a Pretender|pretender]], having heard their whisperings at the end of the Age of Calamity.
Alchemist Change formula list. Bard Bloodrager Fighter Paladin
The pantokrator is dead and the world stands on the precipice. Will it fall into decay and ruin or will another god rise to power and found a new pantheon?
Raising the Dead

Friendly Dominion +1 morale affect on prophet stats Scales law vs chaos luck vs misfortune - bonus events, helps checks, nat 1s do something bad heat vs cold growth vs death Luck vs Misfortune 3 : roll three times on random events and choose best 2 1 0 -1: natural 1s result in a fumble Misfortune 1 Rolls of natural 1 result in a fumble Misfortune 2
#Ars Every spell made of a technique and a domain. Techniques Create Command Reveal Alter Destroy Imbue Domains

This spell calls forth a group of laughing demon-faced beings, to cause mischief at the summoner’s behest. Conjure Cackling Demons #DCC Level: 2 Range: Varies Duration: Varies Casting time: 1 turn Save: Will vs.
Those with truespeech are able to communicate with nearly anyone else they come across who use spoken language. Those hearing them understand their words as being from their own speech.
The porter spell conjures a nearly invisible floating surface which is able to lift and carry objects on behalf of the caster.
The caster uses secret knowledge to grant this blessing to a traveler. So long as they remain on a marked path, harm cannot befall them.
Invoking this ritual requires the true name or a sample of the subject alongside one hundred pounds of fresh red meat.
The subtle caltrop is a spell of incredibly minor potency, only notable due to the sheet cleverness of its construction and specificity of its spitefulness.
1 2 3 4 5 id: Hambleton image: [[Maps/TheRealms.png]] bounds: - [0, 0] - [75, 75]
The Amalgam A terrifying combination of man, beast, and material - the amalgam is all that remains of Harlan the Alchemist after inventing [[Potions And Alchemy/The Prime Acid]].
Blackflame ghouls are the animated corpses of people slain by insidious blackflame, now risen as unrelenting creatures of rage and savagery.
Str: 16 Dex: 18 Con: 8 Int: - Wis: 4 Cha: 10 Abilities 1 monster: Brain Wasp
Cackling Demon #DCC Str Cackling Demon #ArsMagica Might Cackling Demon #d100
Cursed to always battle, never accepting quarter or engaging in diplomacy. Tongue is a dagger, cannot speak, but can spit knives at range.
1 monster: Manticore Devil’s Garden
Every night above the water a ghostly shimmering city appears. Distant figures stroll its wide promenades and dance to faint music at the very edge of hearing.
[[Systems/Identifying Potions|Properties]]: viscous black ashy dust If applied under and around the eyes graysight allows the user to see the outlines of nearby objects.
Labyrinth, also known as the City on the Edge of Anywhere, is a city which travels between the realms.
Potions include any of a number of alchemical substances and their intermediates. An initial inspection of physical properties can provide some clue as to the nature of the substance in question.
Places of power are locations where mystical energies converge. can be used by wizards to gather essence if they can control the place

Working in the lab #ArsMagica Nexus of Power A nexus of power is a place where magical energies converge, sourced from the surrounding regions, the caster’s own soul, and the places of power they control.

item.title: The Prime Acid
item.description: [[Systems/Identifying Potions|Properties]]: superfluidic clear grayish flavorless liquid The Prime Acid, known also as oil of blending is a thin superfluidic liquid that does far more than eat away base substance as other acids do.
